english.segment1: The Earth will be filled with His glory . Like the water covers the sea . And today is just one more day closer to . Every tribe, nation, and creed. Joining as one to praise His name . Let's sing and dance and raise our hands . 'Cause we know what's coming
english.segment2: Chorus: Hallelujah, this could be the day . Hallelujah, so we come here to celebrate
english.segment3: The ends of the earth will acknowledge and turn . To the Lord our God when the trumpets are heard . While the rest of the world is caught by surprise . His people will rejoice for their time has arrived. Let's all join together and praise His name . We'll sing and dance and raise our hands . 'Cause we know what's coming
